author: newsr.in
title: Google Capital makes a $32.5M bet on smart health insurance company Oscar
text: Google Capital has made a $32.5 million investment in the online health insurer and doctor finder Oscar, bringing the the startup’s funding total up to $352.5 million at a valuation of $1.75 billion. The investment comes not too long after Oscar took a monster $145 million funding round in April, at which time the company’s valuation […] »
